title: Minor (Honours Program)
desc: A minor in Biology consists of a minimum of 5.00 credits including the following courses:
BIOL*1080 Biological Concepts of Health is a prerequisite for some CBS courses.
Students registered in B.Sc. majors in biological science may not declare this minor.
footnotes: The list of approved biological science electives is posted at http://www.uoguelph.ca/bsc.
